episodesJson.title: SHORTS - Hey, Google
episodesJson.description: We're trying something new today! We noticed a glut of bad gay short films on our streaming services, and decided, on our off weeks, that maybe we'd talk briefly about those. So if an hour and a half of us yammering in your ears every two weeks just isn't enough, now you can hear us talk for twenty more minutes about a short film it only takes ten minutes to watch.
topics: How soon is too soon for a pandemic related story?
Why you probably shouldn't make a movie that makes the watcher's smart device chime every 30 seconds
